name: Jellyfish Journey
description:
Game made within 32 hours for the Ukie Green Game Jam with a focus on environmental issues and climate change. 

The game follows the player as a jellyfish as they make their way from the sea bed to the ocean surface. They must eat to survive, avoid dangerous predators/pollutants and upgrade their character to help them survive. 

A bug has been fixed prior to the jam finished and has been uploaded as a seperate installer, so if you arent judging for the jam and just want to try the game, please go with that one!
